raw: * Provides a way to block elements so they will no longer receive (native)
* events by overlaying them with a DIV element.
* @require(qx.module.Environment)
* @require(qx.module.Manipulating)
* @require(qx.module.Traversing)
* @require(qx.module.Css)
* @require(qx.module.Attribute)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Provides a way to block elements so they will no longer receive (native) events by overlaying them with a DIV element.

raw: * Attaches a blocker div to the given element.
* @param item {Element|Document} The element to be overlaid with the blocker
* @param color {String} The color for the blocker element (any CSS color value)
* @param opacity {Number} The CSS opacity value for the blocker
* @param zIndex {Number} The zIndex value for the blocker

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Attaches a blocker div to the given element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {Element|Document} The element to be overlaid with the blocker
@param.description: The element to be overlaid with the blocker

@param.name: @param
@param.body: color {String} The color for the blocker element (any CSS color value)
@param.description: The color for the blocker element (any CSS color value)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: opacity {Number} The CSS opacity value for the blocker
@param.description: The CSS opacity value for the blocker

@param.name: @param
@param.body: zIndex {Number} The zIndex value for the blocker
@param.description: The zIndex value for the blocker

raw: * Styles the blocker element(s)
* @param item {Element|Document} The element to be overlaid with the blocker
* @param color {String} The color for the blocker element (any CSS color value)
* @param opacity {Number} The CSS opacity value for the blocker
* @param zIndex {Number} The zIndex value for the blocker
* @param isDocument {Boolean} Whether the item is a document node

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {Element|Document} The element to be overlaid with the blocker
@param.description: The element to be overlaid with the blocker

@param.description: The color for the blocker element (any CSS color value)

@param.description: The CSS opacity value for the blocker

@param.name: @param
@param.body: zIndex {Number} The zIndex value for the blocker
@param.description: The zIndex value for the blocker

@param.name: @param
@param.body: isDocument {Boolean} Whether the item is a document node
@param.description: Whether the item is a document node

raw: * Removes the given item's blocker element(s) from the DOM
* @param item {Element} Blocked element
* @param index {Number} index of the item in the collection

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the given item's blocker element(s) from the DOM

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Number} index of the item in the collection
@param.description: index of the item in the collection

raw: * Returns the blocker elements as collection
* @param collection {qxWeb} Collection to get the blocker elements from
* @return {qxWeb} collection of blocker elements

@param.name: @param
@param.body: collection {qxWeb} Collection to get the blocker elements from
@param.description: Collection to get the blocker elements from

raw: * Adds an overlay to all items in the collection that intercepts mouse
* events.
* @attach {qxWeb}
* @param color {String ? transparent} The color for the blocker element (any CSS color value)
* @param opacity {Number ? 0} The CSS opacity value for the blocker (floating point number from 0 to 1)
* @param zIndex {Number ? 10000} The zIndex value for the blocker
* @return {qxWeb} The collection for chaining

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds an overlay to all items in the collection that intercepts mouse events.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: color {String ? transparent} The color for the blocker element (any CSS color value)
@param.description: The color for the blocker element (any CSS color value)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: opacity {Number ? 0} The CSS opacity value for the blocker (floating point number from 0 to 1)
@param.description: The CSS opacity value for the blocker (floating point number from 0 to 1)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: zIndex {Number ? 10000} The zIndex value for the blocker
@param.description: The zIndex value for the blocker

raw: * Removes the blockers from all items in the collection
* @attach {qxWeb}
* @return {qxWeb} The collection for chaining

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the blockers from all items in the collection

raw: * Returns all blocker elements as collection.
* Note: This will only return elements if
* the block method was called at least once,
* since the blocker elements are created on-demand.
* @attach {qxWeb}
* @return {qxWeb} collection with all blocker elements

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns all blocker elements as collection. Note: This will only return elements if the block method was called at least once, since the blocker elements are created on-demand.
